entry.title: Set static IP on Ubuntu
entry.content:
Edit: sudo vim /etc/network/interfaces

Then change the content, assuming you want to set your IP as "192.168.1.66" # The primary network interface auto eth0 iface eth0 inet static

    address 192.168.1.66
    netmask 255.255.255.0
    network 192.168.1.0
    broadcast 192.168.1.255
    gateway 192.168.1.1

Then to restart your network. sudo /etc/init.d/networking restart
